alert.note: Alert for Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 3:36PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT MACOMB AND EASTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EST... At 336 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Macomb Township, or 8 miles northwest of Mount Clemens, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Huron, Mount Clemens, New Baltimore, Richmond, St. Clair, Sterling Heights, Marysville, Marine City, Clinton, Armada, Memphis, Macomb Township, Utica, New Haven, Washington, Columbus, Anchorville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, and Fort Gratiot. This includes the following highways... I-94 between mile markers 237 and 273. I-69 between mile markers 190 and 199. M-39 between mile markers 16 and 24. M-53 between mile markers 16 and 24. M-59 near mile marker 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
